existing_features.title: Update the "Add New Resident" and "Edit Resident" flows to allow staff/admin users to set or change the Resident Code Status (Full Code / DNR).
Display each resident’s Code Status on the Residents Dashboard in a bold, visually highlighted style that clearly distinguishes "DNR" from "Full Code".
Show the resident’s Code Status on the Resident Profile page so the Code Status is visible when viewing an individual resident record.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Code Status (Full Code / DNR) to each Resident profile and display it in bold/highlight on the Residents Dashboard
Add a persistent "Code Status" field to each Resident record in the backend with exactly two supported values: "Full Code" and "DNR".
Implement upgrade-safe state migration so that all existing stored residents receive a valid default Code Status value (default to "Full Code") after deployment.

projectName: Add Resident Code Status (Full Code / DNR) and highlight it on the Residents Dashboard
